name: Gakuen iDOLM@STER
description: Gakuen iDOLM@STER is a Japanese video game spin-off of The iDOLM@STER developed by QualiArts and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

name: Arknights
description: Arknights is a free-to-play tactical RPG/tower defense mobile game developed by Chinese developer Hypergryph.

name: Fate/Grand Order
description: Fate/Grand Order is a free-to-play Japanese gacha mobile game, developed by Lasengle using Unity, and published by Aniplex, a subsidiary of Sony Music Entertainment Japan.

name: Blue Archive
description: Blue Archive is a free-to-play role-playing game developed by South Korean developer MX Studio under the management umbrella of Nexon Games.

name: Project Sekai
description: Hatsune Miku: Colorful Stage! is a rhythm game developed by Colorful Palette (a subsidiary of CyberAgent) with cooperation from Sega and published by Sega.
